ing: 2 ripe avocados - peeled, halved and pitted
1/4 whole fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and diced
1 teaspoon chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Tropiguac is my spin on guacamole. Its zesty, tropical flavor is a great appetizer to serve on a hot day. Cucumber is optional, but it's an extra zero calorie vegetable that makes the guacamole taste cool and refreshing -- and it also makes for more servings without adding cost!"
ins:
Mash the avocados in a large bowl.
Mix in the pineapple, mango, tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, cilantro, lime juice, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper until well blended.
